===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=こうれいじゅつ|交霊|tr1=kōrei|t1=calling the spirits of the dead|術|tr2=jutsu|t2=technique, art}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうれいじゅつ}}

# [[spiritualism]]

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|降霊術|こうれいじゅつ}}: [[necromancy]]

====Usage notes====
Of the two terms {{l|ja|降霊術}} and {{l|ja|交霊術}}, the former implies more of a sense of [[summon]]ing, and the latter more of a sense of [[exchange]] or [[communication]].
